errno.description: Error number (When the result is not equal to zero, the request fails)
Error number of module (when the result is not equal to zero, the serial number cannt meet the requirements)

devices.description: Information of modules (needed for creating pv/energy-storage power station)

pileSN.description: Charge pile's serial number (needed for charge pile power station)

type.description: Type of power station (1-pv power station,2-energy-storage power station,3-charge-pile power station,4-mini-device power station)

countryCode.description: Country's code of power station (Two-bit code, such as China is \"CN\",Reference address: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)

price.description: Electric price of power station (needed for creating pv/energy-storage/mini-device power station)

currency.description: The currency of electricity price measurement (needed for editing pv/energy-storage/mini-device power station, reference: U.S. dollar-USD($), Euro-EUR(€), Vietnamese Dong-VND(D.), RMB-CNY(¥), Pound sterling-GBP(￡), Australian dollar-AUD($), Poland-PLN(Zł), India-INR(₹), Brazil-BRL(R$), S.Africa-ZAR(R), THB (THB)-THB(฿), Pakistani rupee-PKR(Rs))

systemCapacity.description: System's capacity of power station (needed for creating pv/energy-storage/mini-device power station)

timezone.description: Detailed time zone in English (\"district\"+\"/\"+\"country\", such as: Asia/Shanghai, Reference address: https://nodatime.org/TimeZones)

electricmeterSN.description: Serial number of electricmeter (needn't if empty)

layoutByMini.description: Information of mini-device (needed for creating mini-device power station)

sn.description: Serial number of module (needed for creating mini-device power station)

horizontal.description: Horizontal number (needed for creating mini-device power station)

vertical.description: Vertical number (needed for creating mini-device power station)

azimuth.description: Azimuth angle (needed for creating mini-device power station, between 0 and 360°)

dipAngle.description: Angle of inclination (needed for creating mini-device power station, between 0 and 90°)

direction.description: Direction ( needed for creating mini-device power station, 1-vertical, 2-horizontal)

capacity.description: Component capacity (needed for creating mini-device power station)

model.description: Component type (needed for creating mini-device power station)
